Deactivate Account tip1: You are about to apply for the deactivation of your account.
Deactivate Account tip2: Please note that account deactivation will take effect after a 7-day cooling-off period following submission. If you log in again within these 7 days, the deactivation request will be automatically cancelled.
Deactivate Account tip3: Once account deactivation takes effect, you will no longer be able to access any information or services in the account, all related data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Additionally, all accounts linked to this account can be reused for registering new accounts and linking other account.
